neckties.title: Rosewood Reverie
neckties.description: Infused with timeless charm, the Rosewood Reverie necktie showcases a classic paisley motif in rich shades of pink and soft silver. Its silky texture and intricate design make it an ideal choice for formal occasions, weddings, or any moment that calls for a touch of refined sophistication.
neckties.styleGuide: Pairs effortlessly with charcoal, light grey, or navy suits, adding a romantic and elegant flair to your ensemble.

neckties.title: Tangerine Tact
neckties.description: Bold yet refined, the Tangerine Tact necktie features a lively orange hue accentuated by a delicate chevron weave. Its vibrant color and sleek finish make it perfect for those looking to make a stylish statement at summer weddings, festive events, or business-casual gatherings.
neckties.styleGuide: Matches beautifully with light grey, navy, or beige suits, adding a fresh, energetic pop to your overall look.

neckties.title: Purple Prism
neckties.description: The Purple Prism necktie showcases a rich purple tone layered with a fine geometric texture that catches the light beautifully. Ideal for evening events, formal occasions, or adding a pop of confidence to professional attire.
neckties.styleGuide: Complements charcoal, navy, and black suits, delivering a modern yet distinguished edge.

neckties.title: Jade Reverie
neckties.description: The Jade Reverie tie features a calming green background intricately woven with a soft paisley pattern in muted silver tones. Perfect for daytime weddings, garden parties, or adding an elegant flair to a summer suit.
neckties.styleGuide: Looks exceptionally refined with beige, cream, or light grey suits for a fresh, sophisticated look.

neckties.title: Bold Blush Charm
neckties.description: With a deep black base and intricate dusty pink paisley embroidery, the Bold Blush Charm tie strikes a perfect balance between classic sophistication and modern flair. Ideal for formal events or when you want to make a statement without shouting.
neckties.styleGuide: Pairs exquisitely with black, charcoal, or even deep burgundy suits for an unforgettable, polished look.

neckties.title: Amber Grid Classic
neckties.description: Bright and charismatic, the Amber Grid Classic tie features a vivid orange tone with a refined grid pattern highlighted by subtle silver accents. It brings a burst of lively elegance to any ensemble.
neckties.styleGuide: Looks fantastic with navy, grey, or beige suits, ideal for both daytime events and adding a pop of color to workwear.

neckties.title: Golden Gleam Check
neckties.description: Radiating positivity and charm, the Golden Gleam Check tie is crafted with a bright yellow hue and a refined micro-checkered pattern, creating a sophisticated yet cheerful statement.
neckties.styleGuide: Best paired with navy, charcoal, or light grey suits, perfect for spring weddings, daytime events, or to add an uplifting touch to business attire.

neckties.title: Crimson Board
neckties.description: Deep crimson with an intricate shadow weave, this tie creates a bold yet refined look, perfect for leaving a memorable impression.
neckties.styleGuide: Pairs excellently with black, charcoal, or navy suits; ideal for formal dinners, weddings, or adding a splash of power to corporate attire.

neckties.title: Rosé Rally
neckties.description: A vibrant fusion of blush pink, deep navy, white, and a touch of magenta creates a bold yet tasteful tie that's perfect for making a stylish statement.
neckties.styleGuide: Pairs beautifully with light grey, navy blue, or charcoal suits; ideal for spring weddings, cocktail events, and business-casual gatherings.

neckties.title: Golden Charm
neckties.description: A vibrant golden-yellow tie featuring an elegant checkered texture, ideal for adding a lively yet polished touch.
neckties.styleGuide: Perfect with navy, gray, or black suits; great for weddings, spring celebrations, or brightening up office attire.

neckties.title: Royal Whimsy
neckties.description: A luxurious lavender tie adorned with a classic deep purple paisley design, embodying charm and sophistication.
neckties.styleGuide: Pairs beautifully with charcoal, navy, or black suits; ideal for formal events, weddings, or a dashing evening look.

neckties.title: Vintage Charm
neckties.description: A rich brown tie with intricate gold paisley patterns, offering a vintage yet polished elegance.
neckties.styleGuide: Complements tan, beige, dark brown and navy suits; perfect for autumn weddings, classic office looks, or an evening out with a twist.

neckties.title: Highland Flair
neckties.description: A bold plaid design in shades of blue and purple, blending classic tradition with modern attitude.
neckties.styleGuide: Matches perfectly with navy, charcoal, or light grey suits; ideal for business casual looks, formal occasions, or injecting a pop of personality into your everyday outfit.

neckties.title: Midnight Maze
neckties.description: A modern twist with an intricate navy and light blue geometric weave that captures light and attention effortlessly.
neckties.styleGuide: Perfect for sleek navy or grey suits; excellent for formal events, important meetings, or when you want to make a sharp, confident impression.

neckties.title: Ocean Breeze
neckties.description: Fresh aqua blues, navy, and green stripes bring vibrant energy and effortless charm to your outfit.
neckties.styleGuide: Ideal for spring and summer events, outdoor weddings, or brightening up a navy or light grey suit with a playful yet polished touch.

neckties.title: Royal Twilight
neckties.description: Deep violets, lilacs, and sharp white accents make this tie a bold, confident choice for both formal and smart-casual looks.
neckties.styleGuide: Best paired with a charcoal, black, or light grey suit for a sophisticated pop of color. Perfect for weddings, business events, or evening gatherings.
